column5: For the first time in my life I've been told I need to speak louder   My mother has always told me, along with a couple of other people to lower my volume, and now I've been told I'm not loud enough at the Fishing for Tyler...I can't win  If anyone has a megaphone or microphone I could borrow for the day I wold really appreciate it...if not any ideas if I can rent one?  Thanks Maureen
WHO NEEDS A MEGAPHONE   WHEN YOU HAVE   BOWSHEP coming
By bro in law has one . I'll bring it along  check out auction items as Pigeonfisher wants to know where to send his cheque for BBall tickets .  TB
If you have trouble finding one, head to the cop shop.  We borrow theirs for some of our bike races.
The TTC has hundreds of them lying around somewhere Moe. Talk to a Supervisor/Inspector[whatever] explain your reason, and I'm sure they will help out.
And Dave, thank you and your bro in law  Maureen
